name: sharding-tools
title: Sharding Tools
description: ShardingTools 是一个专门为数据库分库分表场景设计的专业 Raycast 扩展工具。它提供了完整的分库分表配置管理、实时计算和 SQL 生成功能，大大提高开发者在分库分表场景下的工作效率。
author: KevinWang0224

commands.name: addtable
commands.title: 添加分库分表配置
commands.description: 添加配置，设置分库分表参数

commands.name: list
commands.title: 查看分库分表列表
commands.description: 查看已保存的分库分表配置和生成的分片列表

commands.name: calculator
commands.title: 分库分表计算器
commands.description: 输入分表因子值计算对应的库和表

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
